title: centralized login/pwd, usable on a set of connections
author: vinsse2001
body_snippet:
Hello, thanks for this very useful tool :) !

So, here is a request for a new feature: 
=> **Instead of typing user/pwd in each connection**, it would be very useful to be able to **choose in a list of accounts**. So, when we need to update password, we just do it in accounts list, not in each connection.

## Expected Behavior
In connection configuration panel, I have the choice between typing login and password, or choosing an existing profile.
And somewhere else (in a new window, or in ...
